Description: Rim and handle sherd of Corinthian pottery miniature kotyle (kotyliskos); interior glazed black; exterior: black around rim (only traces remaining) and below handle.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1982 / Painted Pottery from the Greek Mainland found in Egypt, 640-450 BC (p. 99, no. A147)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GB.319) (phase 3)
